message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of minimizing the age of information (AoI) in an energy-harvesting sensor node, which involves designing an optimal transmission policy. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT), as well as networking and communication (cs.NI) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also uses mathematical optimization techniques (cs.MA) and statistical analysis (cs.LG) to derive the optimal policy.
